sourcesContent:
import { BarChart, CartesianGrid, XAxis, YAxis, Tooltip, Bar, Label } from 'recharts'
const UserRFM = ({ data }) => {
	return (
		<BarChart width={900} height={400} data={[ data ]} margin={{ top: 30, right: 30, left: 100, bottom: 30 }}>
			<CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
			<XAxis>
				<Label value="RFM Score" offset={-2} position="insideBottom" />
			</XAxis>
			<YAxis domain={[ 0, 5 ]} />
			<Tooltip />
			<Bar dataKey="rscore" fill="#2980b9" label />
			<Bar dataKey="fscore" fill="#e74c3c" label />
			<Bar dataKey="mscore" fill="#2ecc71" label />
		</BarChart>
	)
}

export default UserRFM
